column2: Your rival [From.GetBestName] is asking permission from [From.Liege.GetBestName] to duel you.

column2: I accused the cheater to a duel in front of all the tournament participants, the spectators and our host, [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. No cheater will get away with it!
column3: I accused the cheater to a duel in front of all the tournament participants, the spectators and our host, [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. No cheater will get away with it!
column4: I accused the cheater to a duel in front of all the tournament participants, the spectators and our host, [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. No cheater will get away with it!
column6: Reté al tramposo(a) a un duelo, delante de todos los participantes del torneo, los espectadores y nuestro anfitrión, [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. ¡Ningún tramposo se saldrá con la suya!

column2: The duel is over. Neither you nor your opponent are harmed.
column3: Le duel est terminé. Ni vous ni ton opponent ne vous êtes fait mal.
column4: The duel is over. Neither you nor your opponent are harmed.
column6: El duelo acabó. Ni tú ni tu oponente habéis sido heridos.

column2: I defeated the cheater and thus proved they are a cheater
column3: I defeated the cheater and thus proved they are a cheater
column4: I defeated the cheater and thus proved they are a cheater
column6: Derroté al tramposo(a) y por lo tanto demostré que yo tenía razón y era un tramposo(a).

column2: I proved their guilt when my rival lay unconscious on the ground by my feet
column3: I proved their guilt when my rival lay unconscious on the ground by my feet
column4: I proved their guilt when my rival lay unconscious on the ground by my feet
column6: Demostré su culpabilidad cuando mi rival quedó inconsciente a mis pies.

column2: Hopefully our liege won't be angry...
column3: Espérons que notre seigneur ne sera pas fâché...
column4: Hopefully our liege won't be angry...
column6: Esperemos que nuestro señor no se enfade...

column2: I'll get you next time, [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] scum!
column3: Je t'aurais la prochaine fois, ordure [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] !
column4: I'll get you next time, [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] scum!

column2: I proved my innocence when my rival lay unconscious on the ground by my feet
column3: J'ai prouvé mon innocence - mon rival git inconscient, au sol, à mes pieds.
column4: Ich bewies meine Unschuld, als Mein Rivale mir bewusstlos zu Füßen lag

column2: I defeated my rival and thus proved I am not a cheater
column3: J'ai vaincu mon rival et ainsi prouvé que je n'ai jamais cédé à la tricherie.
column4: Ich besiegte Mein Rivale und bewies damit, dass ich kein Betrüger bin
column6: Derroté a mi rival y, por lo tanto demostré que no soy un tramposo
